overview: In 'Part 2,' Mike De Marko stops, drops, and then rolls over to take on FX Rijos’ uncut meat in a pedal-to-the-metal exchange. Boomer Banks gets so worked up by Sean Zevran lubing his chassis that he takes Sean’s meaty dick up his ass – for the first time on film. You will not believe how hot it is when these two monster-hung studs get into the fast lane! Jaxton Wheeler wields his Herculean physique to deliver a heart-racing, heroic pounding to Mike De Marko’s hairy ass. David Benjamin and Nick Capra drive each other wild, sniffing, licking, spitting and pounding like pistons. Just like the cars they service in the shop, the men of 'Auto Erotic, Part 2' are lean mean muscle machines guaranteed to get your engine revving!
title: Auto Erotic, Part 2
